short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send personalized messages to your clients with our extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our WhatsApp messaging extension is the perfect tool to enhance your chat experience. With this extension, you can expand WhatsApp's functionalities, easily organizing conversations, scheduling messages, customizing the interface, and accessing exclusive features to boost productivity and convenience in your communication. Simplify your WhatsApp experience and take your conversations to the next level with our messaging extension.


Custom message fields:

Export your contacts from excel or Google Sheets in csv format

Example of a personalized message:


Dear [name]
I greet you from school [field3], I am writing to inform you of your qualification [field6] of the subject of [field5] of the course of [field4].
Your next [field7] exam.
Attached schedule of exams in image format.
Greetings [name]

Control of connected devices
Wapi profile management
Membership expiration date control
Notification of future updates.
Shipping reports by day and month


Import name, phone numbers and custom fields from a CSV.
Personalized message, according to the custom fields.
Add emojis in the message.
format your messages, Italic, Bold, Strikethrough, Monospace
Attach WhatsApp Contacts.
Attach image, video and audio.
Attach PDF, ZIP, RAR and other files.
Add description of the attachment.
Program delay time between one message and another.


Download shipping, failed and pending reports
Store shipping reports in the cloud
Stop and pause sending
Resume or restart sending in the background


Create keywords to send an autoresponder
Create a menu for help, billing, support, sales, etc.


Post or schedule statuses in text
Publish or schedule statuses in image or video
